alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 28 at 2:43PM MDT until March 28 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 9 PM MDT this evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, 224, and 226 through 237, which includes the San Luis Valley, Fremont and Teller counties, and all of the southeast plains... ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday for gusty winds and low relative humidity, for fire weather zone 237, which includes Baca County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread this afternoon and evening, and again on Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
